section:
adt_vector.h File Reference adt_vector.h #include <adt/adt_api.h> #include <stdlib.h> Include dependency graph for adt_vector.h:
This graph shows which files directly or indirectly include this file:
Macros
#define vector_create_type(type_name) vector_create(sizeof(type_name))
#define vector_create_reserve_type(type_name, capacity) vector_create_reserve(sizeof(type_name), capacity)
#define vector_front_type(v, type_name) (*((type_name *)vector_front(v)))
#define vector_back_type(v, type_name) (*((type_name *)vector_back(v)))
#define vector_at_type(v, position, type_name) (*((type_name *)vector_at(v, position)))
#define vector_set_var(v, position, variable) vector_set(v, position, &variable)
#define vector_push_back_var(v, variable) vector_push_back(v, &variable)
#define vector_push_front_var(v, variable) vector_push_front(v, &variable)
#define vector_insert_var(v, position, variable) vector_insert(v, position, &variable)
#define vector_set_const(v, position, constant, type_name)
#define vector_push_back_const(v, constant, type_name)
#define vector_push_front_const(v, constant, type_name)
#define vector_insert_const(v, position, constant, type_name)
Typedefs
typedef struct vector_type * vector

#define vector_at_type( v, position, type_name) (*((type_name *)vector_at(v, position)))
Access to object at @position where: [0 <= @position <= vector_size(v) - 1 ].

in v
Vector pointer
in position

vector_set_var vector_set_varadt_vector.h adt_vector.hvector_set_var
#define vector_set_var( v, position, variable) vector_set(v, position, &variable)
Sets a variable object at @position to the same object pointed by @element.
Parameters
in v
Vector pointer
in position
Position of element to be modified
in variable

in type_name
Type of element to be modified

vector_insert_var vector_insert_varadt_vector.h adt_vector.hvector_insert_var
#define vector_insert_var( v, position, variable) vector_insert(v, position, &variable)
Adds a variable object in @position where: [ 0 <= @position <= vector_size(v) - 1 ] Tail objects from @position will be moved (increments allocated memory if neccessary)

in v

in position

in variable
Variable element to be inserted
in type_name
Type of element to be inserted
